description: Conscious back-formation from sheep on the pattern of Germanic strong declension nouns such as goose → geese, tooth → teeth, foot → feet, and the similarly jocularly-formed moose → meese.

entries.meaning: (slang, chiefly humorous) A sheep; specifically singular form of sheep.
examples: > http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/ASIN/0091807549/o/qid=979300168/sr=8-1/026-8769325-3040456I thought you were a goat not a shoop.

entries.meaning: (Internet slang) An image that has been modified using Adobe Photoshop or similar image-manipulation software to produce a misleading impression; an instance of petty, amateur fauxtography.
